name: Gasoline
description: A petroleum-derived liquid fuel used primarily in internal combustion engines.

name: Diesel
description: A heavier petroleum-based fuel used in diesel engines, known for higher energy density.

name: Electric
description: Energy stored in batteries used to power electric vehicles.

name: Ethanol
description: A biofuel made from fermented plant materials, often blended with gasoline.

name: Biodiesel
description: A renewable diesel fuel made from vegetable oils or animal fats.

name: Natural Gas
description: A fossil fuel in gaseous form, used in compressed (CNG) or liquefied (LNG) states for vehicles.

name: Hydrogen
description: A clean fuel used in fuel cell vehicles, producing only water as a byproduct.

name: Propane
description: A liquefied petroleum gas used as fuel in some vehicles and heating applications.

name: Methanol
description: An alcohol-based fuel sometimes used in racing or as a gasoline additive.
